title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 14
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

Despite three categorised climbs, the General Classification was only slightly altered after Stage 14 of the Vuelta a España. Odd Christian Eiking retains the red jersey, whilst Guillaume Martin is just 54 seconds behind.

1. Odd Christian Eiking
2. Guillaume Martin +0:54
3. Primož Roglič +1:36
4. Enric Mas +2:11
5. Miguel Angel Lopez +3:04
6. Jack Haig +3:35
7. Egan Bernal +4:21
8. Adam Yates +4:49
9. Sepp Kuss +4:59
10. Felix Großschartner +5:31
